industry: Search, Detection, Navigation, Guidance, Aeronautical, and Nautical System and Instrument Manufacturing
description: Garmin, formerly known as ProNav, is an American multinational technology company founded in 1989, with headquarters in Olathe, Kansas. The company specializes in GPS technology for automotive, aviation, marine, outdoor, and sport activities.  Garmin Ltd. is incorporated in Switzerland, and its principal subsidiaries are located in the United States, Taiwan and the United Kingdom. Garmin is a registered trademark of Garmin Ltd.
tags: Search, Detection, Navigation, Guidance, Aeronautical, and Nautical System and Instrument Manufacturing
